description: A cozy, dimly lit tavern with the smell of old wood and spilled ale. A few patrons are scattered around, and a fire crackles in the hearth.

golden_wrapper.name: Golden Wrapper
golden_wrapper.description: A shiny, discarded candy wrapper lying on the dusty floorboards near the bar.

wooden_mug.name: Wooden Mug
wooden_mug.description: A half-full mug of frothy ale sits abandoned on a nearby table.

cash_register.name: Cash Register
cash_register.description: An old, ornate cash register behind the bar.
